Uses of Interface
io.hekate.util.async.Waiting

  • Packages that use Waiting 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.network.netty
    Netty-based implementation of networking API.
    io.hekate.util.async
    Utilities for asynchronous tasks.

    • Uses of Waiting in io.hekate.network.netty

      Methods in io.hekate.network.netty that return Waiting 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Waiting NettyUtils.shutdown(io.netty.util.concurrent.EventExecutorGroup executor)
      Shuts down the specified executor with 0 graceful shutdown period.

    • Uses of Waiting in io.hekate.util.async

      Fields in io.hekate.util.async declared as Waiting 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Waiting Waiting.NO_WAIT
      Do not wait.
      Methods in io.hekate.util.async that return Waiting 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Waiting Waiting.awaitAll(Collection<Waiting> all)
      Returns a single Waiting that will await for all of the specified tasks to complete.
      static Waiting AsyncUtils.shutdown(ExecutorService executor)
      Shuts down the specified executor service and returns a Waiting that will await for termination.
      Method parameters in io.hekate.util.async with type arguments of type Waiting 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Waiting Waiting.awaitAll(Collection<Waiting> all)
      Returns a single Waiting that will await for all of the specified tasks to complete.
